snippet.title: Cruis'n Blast™ - Official Trailer | High-Speed Racing Action!
snippet.description:
The classic arcade game is back! Raw Thrills™ introduces Cruis'n Blast™, their first arcade-exclusive release. The legendary Cruis'n™ series of driving games debuted in the '90s with the arcade smash and Nintendo 64™ launch title Cruis'n USA™, thrilling the world with amazing 3D realism and casual arcade fun. Followed by Cruis'n World™ and Cruis'n Exotica™, the Cruis'n series sold over 70,000 arcade driving machines, grossing over $8 billion worldwide.

With the resurging millennial arcade scene and unprecedented player demand, the time was right for a new Cruis'n game. Eugene Jarvis, Raw Thrills President and creator of the Cruis'n series, presents Cruis'n Blast™.

Key Features:

- Dramatic enclosed cockpit cabinet with fully immersive Thrill-D Blaster™ sound
- BLAST™ turbo boost for truly insane speed
- Awesome supercars including Lamborghini Veneno™, Nissan GTR™, Corvette Z06™, and more
- 43” 1080p HD LED TV for stunning visuals
- Mind-bending color FX from over 1000 vibrant RGD LEDs
- State-of-the-art GTX 750 Ti Nvidia supercomputer HD graphics
- Link up to 8 games for massive multiplayer action

Experience the all-new Cruis'n Blast™ for yourself and feel the thrill of high-speed racing with the best supercars in the world. Ready, set, GO!

If you enjoyed this trailer, make sure to hit the like button and share it with fellow racing game enthusiasts! Don't forget to subscribe to our channel and click the notification bell to stay updated with the latest game releases and trailers. Leave a comment below letting us know which supercar you're most excited to race in Cruis'n Blast™!
